description: The robber fled on a bicycle with cash from the till, say police.
title: Scunthorpe shop worker threatened with machete during robbery
title_page: Scunthorpe shop worker threatened with machete during robbery - BBC News
maintext:
A shop worker has been threatened with a machete during a robbery in Scunthorpe, police have said.
Officers were called to reports of an armed robbery at a store in Manor Road at about 19:50 GMT on Tuesday.
The robber, who was male, wore a face covering and fled on a bicycle, Humberside Police said.
Nobody was hurt, the force added.
